survey_name: Plant-Based Meal Kit Delivery Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have used plant-based meal kit delivery services to understand their satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which plant-based meal kit delivery service have you used in the past 3 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a dropdown menu for better mobile usability. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for specificity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional open-text follow-up for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which plant-based meal kit delivery service have you used in the past 3 months?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of plant-based meal options offered?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled for consistency.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of plant-based meal options offered?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting a plant-based meal kit? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Limit selections to 3 to prioritize preferences.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with a maximum of 3 selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting a plant-based meal kit? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How often do you typically use a plant-based meal kit delivery service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you typically use a plant-based meal kit delivery service?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for plant-based meal kit delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for plant-based meal kit delivery services?
